Derivation:
awk '{ split($0, zero, /\t/); numvowels = 0; wordlen=length(zero[1]); if (wordlen == 8 || wordlen == 7) { for (prefixlen = 1; prefixlen < wordlen; prefixlen = prefixlen + 1) { prefix = substr(zero[1], 1, prefixlen); prefixes[prefix] = prefixes[prefix] + 1; suffix = substr(zero[1], wordlen - prefixlen + 1, prefixlen); suffixes[suffix] = suffixes[suffix] + 1; } wordcount = wordcount + 1; } }\
END { for (prefix in prefixes) { if (prefixes[prefix] > 50 && length(prefix) > 1) print prefix, prefixes[prefix] / wordcount; }  }
' /union_enable1_wwf4.txt | sort -n -k2 -r > prefix_frequencies_in_union_enable1_wwf4_len_7_or_8.txt
